EmailTemplate.subject: Holiday Fulfillment Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: November 11, 2021 Holiday Fulfillment Reminder: Thanksgiving November 25th This is a reminder Thursday, November 25, 2021 is a US National Holiday and observed by NCR and our logistics provider. It is not considered a “business day.” Orders with a Service Level of Next Business Day (NBD) will be fulfilled as shown below. Orders with a Service Level of Next Calendar Day (NCD) will not be affected by the holiday. They will be shipped the same day as ordered and delivered the following day. Next Flight Out (NFO) service will also be available every day, including Thursday the 25th. Please remember 6:00PM Eastern Time is the daily cut off.
